column2: "Nna ɔdze ndze kɛse kaa mu guu m'asomu
column4: Hom mma hɔn a wɔhwɛ kurow no do no wɔntwe mpin
column5: nyimpa biara n'akodze a wɔdze sɛɛ kitsa ne nsamu."

column3: mbarimba baasa fi etsifi abokɛse a ɔda kwaamu afamu kwan do no bae
column4: nyimpa biara n'akodze a wɔdze ku kitsa ne nsamu; na barimba baako wɔ hɔn mu a ɔhyɛ ndwera a kyerɛwnyi dubirtoa sɛn ne nkyɛmfamu. Na wɔkɔr mu kegyinaa boran afɔrmbukyia no nkyɛn."

column2: "Na Israel Nyankopɔn n'enyimnyam fii kerub a ɔwɔ do no do baa ofi no n'abowano: na ɔfrɛɛ barimba a ɔhyɛ ndwera a kyerɛwnyi dubirtoa sɛn ne nkyɛmfamu no."

column5: na kɛhyɛ mbarimba a wosi nkrum na wɔkeka mu wɔ ekyiwadze a wɔyɛ no wɔ mu no hɔn momapɔw do nsew."

column2: "Na nkaa no so ɔsee hɔn wɔ m'aso mu dɛ
column3: Hom ndzi n'ekyir nkodua kurow no mu
column4: na hom nkuku: mma hom enyiwa nnkam do
na mbofraba na mbaa dwɛɛ: na nyimpa biara a nsewhyɛ wɔ no ho no dze
column5: mma hom mmbɛn no; na hom nhyɛ ase wɔ mo krɔnkrɔn bea hɔ. Nna wɔhyɛɛ ase wɔ atsetsefo a wɔwɔ ofi no enyim no do."

column3: Hom ngu ofi no ho fi
column4: na hom mfa atɔfo nhyehyɛ abangua no do amaama: hom mfir edzi nkɔ. Na wofiir edzi kɔree

column8: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn! Aso ebɛsɛɛ Israel nkaa nyinara wɔ w'ebufuw a iruhue egu Jerusalɛm do no mu?"

column3: Israel na Juda fifo emumuyɛ so ntrado
column4: na asaase no do ayɛ bɔgya ma na kurow no mu ayɛ ntɛnkyew ma: na wɔsee dɛ

column5: na medze hɔn kwan bobua hɔn etsifi."

column3: barimba a ɔhyɛ ndwera a dubirtoa sɛn ne nkyɛmfamu no
column6: Mayɛ dɛ mbrɛ ehyɛɛ me no."
